column3:
â€œThis version of Space Candy was purchased at Fresh Buds PDX, Batch #10862. It's currently my favorite strain to smoke. The aroma of the flowers is sharp and biting, in a good way. Lots of pine and lemon aroma in the nose, with a real sour (good way, again) smell, like a lime. Visually, it's hard to tell if it's dark green or purple, there are so many white crystals and red hairs on these dense nugs. 
The smoke is fla...â€

â€œOMG this is the shit,  big beautiful buds sweet citus smell and ripping bong hits.

This is a perfect example of why you cant be concerned with the numbers and percentages. 
This week this is by far my favorite strain 
Killer breakfast pot but be careful , get a little carried away and DERP !!!!!! you will not recall why you went in the kitchen but I'm sure you will find something to gnash on. 
 this is the kind of w...â€
â€œtangy, coffee inhale. Earthy olive pungent exhale. It's been 1 min. since toking and I feel the train a comin' already. The light at the end of this tunnel is gunna be real bright... ğŸ˜‰â€

â€œSpace Candy is an out of this world concentrate I got from processor Honu . Listed as a hybrid with a total cannabinoids of 72% with a shatter consistency.

The high is a uplifting happy high that had me chatting and laughing.

The flavor on this one is pretty amazing stuff that remind me of grape drink (sugar water purple) it is a very clear sweet grape flavor that is a little medicinal. Very tasty!â€
â€œDefiantly a good strain, good mind x body feel. Doesn't hit immediately.â€

â€œStrong out the gate, and fades into a more mellow head buzz after a while. Decent strain though. Makes me kinda loopy for 20-30 mins after it kicks in. Nice and relaxed after the spacey essence fades.â€

â€œPurchased this strain from my caregiver for the first time about 3 months back, now it is my go to evening strain. Easily one of the best smelling/ tasting strains iv come across. Tastes just like it smells, Grape soda and berry candy. Flawless. The buds reminds me of GDP as far as looks go, orange hairs reaching out of pale purple buds that are coated with trichiomes. After vaporizing you feel awake for about a half...â€
â€œLoved smoking this as I make music. Influenced my creative flowâ€
â€œAll i gotta say is if the strain sounds like its from outer space it will get u fucked upğŸ’¯ğŸ™ŒğŸ½ğŸ‘ŒğŸ½â€

â€œComes on pretty quick with your brain simultaneously stupefying and uplifting in a tantalizing way. Vision is narrow, but accented in a way that triggers an almost physically pleasurable response. Very moving. Ability to function continues to deteriorate while mood elevation increases. Music is close to being the best, but the bewilderment and positive bias prevents much emotional nuance. High can be a bit distractin...â€
â€œA true clown of cannabis. The ivy the adorns Dionysus' upon the crown is akin to this flower. Injestion will surely lead to hilarity.â€

â€œIt's a different yet very good high. The more I smoked the better I felt. This strain is rated high for happy, euphoric feeling. And I can see why. This is most definitely going at the top of my list with my other favorites. 5 stars ğŸ™ŒğŸ¼â€

â€œcame up on a truly excellent batch of space candy at torrey holistics in san diego.  with sparkly (almost shiny-sparkly) nugs and a pronouncedly sweet smell, it was honestly some of the prettiest weed i've ever seen.  

on the effects:  i'm noticing more of a sativa effect up front (most noticeable in the fact that I just worked eight hours behind a computer and still felt motivated to log on Leafly and write this re...â€

â€œUnique strain that smells and tastes like a candy green apple and looks almost like coral with a range of colors. Very resiny and covered in crystals, would be hard to manage without a grinder but still a surprisingly smooth smoke. Nothing too strong in any direction but puts me a relaxed good mood.  Definitely worth checking out but bag appeal alone will have people doing that without any recommendation. 4.5/5â€
â€œErrrMerrrGerrrd! I loved this strain, definitely my favorite strain, taste wise. So sweet and delicious I just canâ€™t get enough of it!â€
â€œsome of the best I've seen in a whileâ€
â€œErrrMerrrGerrrd! I loved this strain, definitely my favorite strain, taste wise. So sweet and delicious I just canâ€™t get enough of it!â€
â€œsome of the best I've seen in a whileâ€

Definitely worth checking out but bag appeal alone will have people doing that without any recommendation. 4.5/5â€

Method: Combustion

I am going to do this review in a robot voice...
Sorry dawgs, I's got trippen in some of my last reviews, whew, a little heavy. Lets bring it back to the weed. One must ride out those peri...â€
â€œAbsolutely love this strain! Had a terrible migraine coming on and it relaxed me enough to loosen the muscles. Migraine was gone within 30 minutes. The munchies are real though. ğŸ˜‚â€

â€œburns nice and slow for me, gently put me through a calmed mind setting and really helps those like me who have heavy depression. This does make me space out and have a good time but make sure you drink a lot of water with this one.â€
â€œSuch a tasty strain. Smooth smoke that's like buttery candy.â€
â€œhonestly great strain to socialize. im high on it ATM. I can best describe the high as uplifting and slightly social.â€
â€œFlavor is very niceâ€
â€œSuch a tasty strain. Smooth smoke that's like buttery candy.â€
â€œThis strain is lovely. It's a great mix of sativa and indica, so it's wonderful for my depression and anxiety.â€
â€œhonestly great strain to socialize. im high on it ATM. I can best describe the high as uplifting and slightly social.â€
â€œgreat combo of heady psychedelic  with the calm body weight. Sweet and earthy, smells calming to keep you tethered on your high.â€
â€œOverall great buzz! Puts me in a good mood but makes me very lazy and forgetful ahah. Fantastic for relaxing or hanging out with a friend.â€
â€œGood strain. The one I have is really high in CBD, about 10%. Good for pain and sleep.â€

â€œgave me a great high while listening to some 60's music. 
gave me some time to relax and unwind.â€

â€œThis strain is absolutely the perfect daytime strain if you struggle with depression, fatigue and ADHD. It's delicious--a great wake and bake with 20 minutes of stoniness on the front end, some munchies and then several hours of focus and uplifting effects. I love it and will be very sad when I get to the end of it.â€

â€œThis is easily one of my top 3 thus far. Even though, I don't have enough reviews to back it up, I have tried many. From what I understand this is Sativa dominate. Who cares? It was a perfect high and relief. It has some of the visual effects of many Sativas, stony, but, also is relaxing as much as it can be uplifting and euphoric.  It does have the potential to make you giggly and have ravenous appetite. On negative...â€
â€œlove this one.â€

â€œSpace Candy has a beautiful bud structure with a frosty green color. The flavor has sweet and citrus notes and the earthy taste makes it a heavy smoke. I would highly recommend this strain for those who are looking for heavy relief after a hard day of work.â€
â€œVery relaxing but also very energizing definitely one of my favorite strains 10/10 would recommendâ€
â€œPretty good hybrid but you know what.... Desert Rose always has some FIRE!â€
â€œGood stuff. The name gives you a pretty good idea of how it feels. Smoke too much and you risk couch lock, but your mind still works. One of my favorites!â€
â€œthis shit made my tongue numb but in a good way. I floated for about 5 hours and came down so smoothly. my boy tried to connect the bluetooth speakers to his wifi.  Thank you lmaoâ€
â€œthis strain hits me really hard, I feel it a lot around the eyes. it's an amazing experience, but is it me or is the flower a little on the crumbly side of things ?â€

â€œOverall a pretty good strain the taste could've been better but that's more the growers fault pretty dense nugs pretty mild high that could be my tolerance though if I had a option I'd have probably picked something else upâ€

â€œJust got this yesterday for the first time. 

Very nice. Tastes great, smells wonderful, looks perfect and feels like a day dream!! ğŸ¤˜ğŸ˜â€
â€œtastes awesome but the high didn't last long.â€
â€œvery good smoke, highly recommend for the euphoria and as an aphrodisiac!â€
â€œThis strain really lived up to my expectations. Has a powerful taste, smell and an uplifting high.â€
â€œthis stain kills it!  nice heavy hits, good cerebral high pungent and sweet.â€
â€œive had 2 different phenos. One is all green and is extremely sedative, the other nearly all purple with heavy body effects and uplifting.â€
â€œGot some Space Candy #4 (Lime Skittles Pheno) from a friend in Maine and I have to say I am very impressed. Strong citrus flavor and aroma. Beautiful. Highly recommend for a day smoke.â€

â€œWe just got a space candy shatter from our local recreational shop. The colour of it is super dark almost grey, the taste of it is sweet with a hint of butane, the smell is questionably normal. The high makes me clench my jaw, that is when I'm not talking my head off. Space candy takes me into space where I can get lost for hours. It's not the strongest high, but it's still a high.â€
â€œvery relaxing couch lockâ€
â€œJesus Christ! I love how Space Candy smells, tastes and looks! I will always buy this if I can find it!â€

â€œThere is a wide variety of color in these buds. There appear to be different phenotypes. Some are green with only a hint of purple, which comes off as a dark green on its hazy, long buds The other is dark purple with orange hairs and dense, fluffy buds. It smells pretty kiefy. 

When smoked, it gives off a light fruity taste. It is sweet, almost like an apple, almost citrus.

I'd add this to my list of racy strains b...â€

â€œThe Space Candy I tried was a sativa of Cotton Candy Kush & Space Queen. The profile of the strain on Leafly, states a different blend. Although the one I tried was good, I am curious to try the Space Candy listed here.â€
â€œFirst ounce I've ever bought. Amazing lemony sweet smell and nice smooth smoke. Had me feeling pretty good body and mind, definitely one of my favorites.â€
â€œGirl friend has cluster migraines this seems to be her fav stain for release to date. Really took the time to enjoy this strainâ€
â€œDank! Very musky yet potent. Makes for a great concentrate as well! Good body high.â€
â€œVery flavorful, strong at 26% thc. Does not dissapoint!â€

â€œI'm a big smoker so it's hard to impress me but this strain? DAMN GINA!! And if you pair it with dutch thunderfuck you are in for the ride of your life! I have to go now, my unicorn is calling me.â€
â€œI love it best feeling in a while earthy and free feeling takes a lil bit but hits u good taste lightly great budâ€
â€œgreat stuff, buds are really good looking and dense.  high was great, taste was great,(indoors).  overall A+ hybrid ğŸ’£ğŸ¬â€
â€œOverall great buzz! Puts me in a good mood but makes me very lazy and forgetful ahah. Fantastic for relaxing or hanging out with a friend.â€
â€œLiked this a lot!  Felt focused and inspired.  Full of ideas, fun conversation.   An excellent time.â€
â€œgreat combo of heady psychedelic  with the calm body weight. Sweet and earthy, smells calming to keep you tethered on your high.â€

â€œburns nice and slow for me, gently put me through a calmed mind setting and really helps those like me who have heavy depression. This does make me space out and have a good time but make sure you drink a lot of water with this one.â€

â€œAwesome head and body high. Seriously helps with muscle spasms and depression, as well as nausea and increased arousal. High doesn't last as long as I would like but what can ya do. Great any time smoke - it was great before and after dinner, before bed it lulled me into a nice sleep and this morning it's uplifting and euphoric. I love this. Flavour is piney and appley, not bad.â€

â€œCandy Train = Space Candy x Trainwreck

Uplifting high. Helps with my depression. Enjoyed working out on it. Favorite strain Iâ€™ve tried so farâ€

â€œThis is by far my favorite strain! The mind and body high that comes with this is out of this  world! I just love that I can just let my mind go wild with this. I feel like I could write a book, clean the house and and the most interesting conversations with someone all at the same time. My explanation is not doing it justice. Itâ€™s a must try!â€
â€œSuch a tasty strain. Smooth smoke that's like buttery candy.â€
â€œAbsolutely love this strain! Had a terrible migraine coming on and it relaxed me enough to loosen the muscles. Migraine was gone within 30 minutes. The munchies are real though. ğŸ˜‚â€
â€œIncredibly awesome strain. Great taste and aroma. This bud made me feel amazingly euphoric and was one of my favorites so far.â€

â€œPurchased this in a preroll. Smooth smoke. No cough. Iâ€™m writing this after pulling a double. Let me take a couple of pulls. 

Smells really good like old school reefer. I have no idea what the color of this bud is, as I said before I purchased a preroll. Why do some guys assume if you smoke you are dtf?â€

â€œgave me a great high while listening to some 60's music. 
gave me some time to relax and unwind.â€
â€œGood strain. The one I have is really high in CBD, about 10%. Good for pain and sleep.â€
â€œhonestly great strain to socialize. im high on it ATM. I can best describe the high as uplifting and slightly social.â€
â€œFlavor is very niceâ€
â€œnice; true to strain description; tasted very similar to smarties candyâ€
â€œThis strain is lovely. It's a great mix of sativa and indica, so it's wonderful for my depression and anxiety.â€

â€œEasily one of my favorite strains! Made me euphoric and giggly while taking my pain and anxiety away completely. A slow creeping high but when it hits, DAMN. I didn't feel too too foggy in the head but definitely felt a little spacey (for lack of a better term), in a good way! I was able to go back to work and focus but also felt very relaxed. The perfect hybrid!â€

â€œthis was a very nice strain.i didn`t get all the smells and tastes everyone else got but it was nice.to me it was a little fruity and lemony and a bit earthy and pungent.dark green w/ lots of orange hairs and a solid nug!the buzz was very nice,not quite as good as i would think from something w/ 25% THC but the buzz was respectable.took care of many issues i have.to me it`s a very good wake and bake strain'â€
